amendment.description: An amendment numbered 65 printed in House Report 115-297 to prevent funds from being used to prepare a five-year offshore oil and gas leasing program that would schedule OCS oil or gas leases before 2022.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McEachin amendment (A090) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McEachin amendment (A090) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A090) offered by Mr. McEachin.
